allowRangeSelection.description: Determines whether tree nodes range can be selected with click when Shift key is pressed, true by default
allowRangeSelection.description_zh: 确定在按下 Shift 键时是否可以通过单击来选择树节点范围，默认情况下为 true

clearSelectionOnOutsideClick.description: Determines whether selection should be cleared when user clicks outside of the tree, false by default
clearSelectionOnOutsideClick.description_zh: 确定当用户在树外部单击时是否应清除选择，默认情况下为 false

expandOnClick.description: Determines whether tree node with children should be expanded on click, true by default
expandOnClick.description_zh: 确定是否应在单击时展开具有子项的树节点，默认情况下为 true

expandOnSpace.description: Determines whether tree node with children should be expanded on space key press, true by default
expandOnSpace.description_zh: 确定是否应在按空格键时展开具有子项的树节点，默认情况下为 true

levelOffset.description: Horizontal padding of each subtree level, key of theme.spacing or any valid CSS value, 'lg' by default
levelOffset.description_zh: 每个子树级别的水平填充、theme.spacing 的键或任何有效的 CSS 值，默认为 'lg'

renderNode.description: A function to render tree node label
renderNode.description_zh: 渲染树节点标签的函数

selectOnClick.description: Determines whether node should be selected on click, false by default
selectOnClick.description_zh: 确定是否应在单击时选择节点，默认情况下为 false

tree.description: Use-tree hook instance that can be used to manipulate component state
tree.description_zh: 可用于操作组件状态的 use-tree 钩子实例
